OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupProjectRed
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Project Red Ores.

Choice.description: Ruby is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: predRubyFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Project Red Ruby distributions

OptionNumeric.name: predRubySize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Project Red Ruby distributions

Choice.description: Sapphire is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: predSapphireFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Project Red Sapphire distributions

OptionNumeric.name: predSapphireSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Project Red Sapphire distributions

Choice.description: Peridot is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: predPeridotFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Project Red Peridot distributions

OptionNumeric.name: predPeridotSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Project Red Peridot distributions

Choice.description: Marble is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: predMarbleFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Project Red Marble distributions

OptionNumeric.name: predMarbleSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Project Red Marble distributions

Choice.description: Basalt is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: predBasaltFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Project Red Basalt distributions

OptionNumeric.name: predBasaltSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Project Red Basalt distributions

Substitute.name: predOverworldOreSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: predRuby0Veins
Veins.Description: Short sparsely filled veins sloping up from near the bottom of the map.

Veins.name: predRuby0Pipe
Veins.Description: Fills center of each tube with Pipe material.

Veins.name: predRuby1Veins
Veins.Description: Short sparsely filled veins sloping up from near the bottom of the map. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: predRuby1Pipe
Veins.Description: Fills center of each tube with Pipe material. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Cloud.name: predRuby0Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: predRuby0HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Cloud.name: predRuby1Cloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: predRuby1HintVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: predRuby1Standard
StandardGen.Description: This mimics vanilla ore generation. 2 times as likely in preferred biomes.
